item1.name: Deep Learning
item1.description: Can handle unstructured data well. This is especially true when most business data today is unstructured. Image, text and voice are considered to be the most common data formats used by enterprises.

item2.name: Big Data
item2.description: Big data helps companies analyze, understand and target their right customers. Understand customers' buying behaviors and trends, and predict the future market situation, so as to make more accurate business decisions.
